name: Astaroth
ability: Recovers a portion of the DMG dealt as HP.
Inflicts Silence on all Phantasma team members and sharply increases their DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a demon who rules hell, though sometimes she behaves more like a goddess. She's very moody so you never know which one she's going to be. It's pretty frustrating, according to those around her. Still, that's how she ended up with the seemingly contradictory nicknames "Ruler of Hell" and "Goddess of Death and Rebirth."

main: "Goddess or demon -- which will it be today♪?"
skill: "What's that you say? I'm being a tad cruel?"
summon: "Ooh, I like you. How 'bout we make a l'il deal?"
limit_break: "I suppose I can look after you a bit longer."
